subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New Box Research Log Sheet Posted

full_text:
--0-72301100-1200060920=:64838
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1

Thanks Sharon!
                             I labled the Research Conducting Session for those who are doing sessions via Skype, or dual persons via different locations.  Sometimes me and Joel do sessions together or by ourselves.  I know Bruce and Steve also conduct dual sessions.  I can change the title if it is confusing.  I was hoping that once we dedcide to conduct various sessions on the same day and time would could name them accordingly such as Research Project_____/ (example) Conducted by:__________.
   
                            I hope this helps!
   
  Thanks!
  Juli


mllejade <leongbabe@...> wrote:
          Thanks for sharing your log sheet Juli. It's quite complete; the 
only thing I might add is the mood/state of mind of the researcher. 
Also, what do you mean by Research Conducting Session?

Thanks again,
Sharon

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Jules" <ghostchasingfool@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Everyone!
> 
> I just uploaded a Box Research Log Sheet to our 
files. 
> There are 2 there, one in PDF Format and the other in Word. 
> 
> When I conduct a session I use this sheet to log 
> important information and questions I will be asking during the 
session 
> and after. Feel free to use it.
> 
> In addition, if you think there should be any 
> additional items added, please let me know.
> 
> 
> Thanks!
> Juli
>
